Talk1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>Well, if it isn't the customer who brought
all those eggs!

<sp:3:0:2:0801>We can barely keep them on the shelves.


They've been especially popular with the
Zonai Survey Team investigating the
<clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff>.
Anyway... What can I do for you?
Com_Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>That looks important... I couldn't possibly
accept that.
Talk1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I have the oddest feeling whenever
we chat...

It's almost like I've known you for ages.
It makes me want to chatter away.

Next time we talk, you should just tell me
what you want. Maybe that'll stop me
from talking your ear off.
Com_Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>You have to remove it before I can take it.
Go onâ€”I won't peek.
Talk1003: <sp:3:0:2:0701>So what can I help you with?
Talk1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Let's see... Of course I recommend the
<clr:0000>swift carrots<clr:ffff> my mister grows. There's
nothing better!
But Olkin's <clr:0000>fortified pumpkins<clr:ffff> are also a
good choice. We didn't use to stock them,
you know...
Old Olkin and my mister quarreled for
years and years.

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_00>But now they get on, and we have those
pumpkins. It's a miracle!
Talk1007:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thanks!<sp:0:4:0>Hey, while you're here, maybe you
should take a look around and see
if there's anything else you want.
Talk1008:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>All of our produce is freshly picked,
straight from the field to you.
So you KNOW it's gonna be tasty.
Talk1009:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Right now is when everything is at
its freshest. Better get it while the
gettin's good!
Talk1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thanks much. My mister'll be happy
about this too.
Talk1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS_01>I can't believe it... <sp:5:1:0>I've got no more of
those?

<sp:3:0:2:0801>Well, glad to make a sale.<sp:5:0:0> I'm very
grateful.
Talk1012:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I don't get away from this place
too often...<sp:0:4:0>So I appreciate your showing me such
interesting things.
Com_Talk_55:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think>Oops... Looks like your pouch is full.
Come back when you've made room.

Of course, if there's anything you don't
need, I'm happy to buy.
Com_Talk_02b:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm really grateful you'd sell me something
of this quality! I can barely believe it.
Com_Talk_02c: <sp:3:0:2:0800>I enjoy trading with all sorts of travelers.
Com_Talk_05b:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0801><clr:ffff>I do enjoy a good chat! Can I help with
anything else?
Com_Talk_02d:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_01>If you're looking for something you can't
find here in Kakariko Village, you probably
didn't need it anyway.
Com_Talk_05c: <clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0801><clr:ffff>Still have something you want to sell?
Com_Talk_05d:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0801><clr:ffff>Deciding what to sell can be fun, so you
just take your time.
Com_Talk_02:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0800><clr:ffff>To think I'd luck into something as neat
as this... My mister will be pleased too.
Com_Talk_31: <clr:0000><snd:QuestionNormal><clr:ffff>Well then, how many do you want?
Com_Talk_04: <sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:QuestionNormal_00>There's no hurry. Please take your time.
Com_Talk_05:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0801><clr:ffff>Travelers have been bringing in the most
interesting items. I can't wait to show
everything to my mister.
